column1: #Text=Zuko says : " Uncle , I know you must have mixed feelings about seeing me .
#Text=I was sad because I was afraid you lost your way .
#Text=" Zuko says : " I did lose my way .
#Text=" Iroh says : " But you found it again .
#Text=And I am so happy you found your way here .
#Text=" Zuko says : " It was n't that hard , Uncle .
#Text=Is it just me , or are those mountains getting bigger ?
